• {{food.name}}
    ❤
    {{origin}}
    ⏰ {{food.cookTime}}
    {{food.price | currency}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { ServiceFoodService } from 'src/app/services/service.food.service'; import { Food } from 'src/app/shared/models/food'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.scss'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { foods:Food[] = []; constructor(private ServiceFoodService:ServiceFoodService,activatedRoute:ActivatedRoute){ activatedRoute.params.subscribe((params)=>{ if(params.searchTerm) this.foods = ServiceFoodService.getAllFoodsBySearchTerm(params.searchTerm); else if(params.tag) this.foods = ServiceFoodService.getAllFoodByTag(params.tag); else this.foods = ServiceFoodService.getAll(); }) } ngOnInit(): void { } }
